title: Phase 7: Hosted Service
description: The 11/10 - Agent-as-a-Service. Zero-config AI automation. Near-zero marginal cost (route messages, don't run browsers). Includes: Firebase stack, relay service, magic token, customer subdomains.

title: Docker Image
description: Cloud deployment requires manual setup. Create pre-built Docker image: docker run -p 4000:4000 haltija/haltija. Headless mode for CI, Xvfb for headed mode in containers.

title: Phase 2: Developer Experience
description: Make it impossible for an individual developer to use anything else. Includes: Browser extension, better error messages, TypeScript SDK, Flight Recorder UI.

title: Browser extension (Chrome/Firefox)
description: Bookmarklet requires manual click per page. CSP blocks injection on some sites. Extension provides persistent injection, survives navigation, works on CSP-restricted sites, toggle on/off per-site.

title: Better error messages with suggestions
description: Some failures are cryptic. Every error should suggest a fix. E.g. 'Element not found: #submit' → 'Element not found: #submit. Did you mean: #submit-btn, button.submit?'

title: TypeScript SDK
description: Raw HTTP calls are tedious. Create type-safe SDK: import { Haltija } from 'haltija'; const h = new Haltija(); await h.click('#submit'). Publish to npm.

title: Flight Recorder UI
description: Click with Diff produces powerful data but it's just JSON. Add visual playback UI in Desktop App with timeline view: Action → DOM Diff (visualized) → Result. Builds trust in AI decision-making.

title: CLI subcommands: haltija tree, haltija click @42 (alias: hj)
description: Simple command-line wrapper that knows GET vs POST, handles JSON, and makes agent examples copy-pasteable without curl ceremony. E.g.: hal tree, hal click @42, hal type @10 'hello', hal screenshot. Should be a thin wrapper that auto-detects method from the endpoint schema. Also: auto-starts the server/app if not running (checks localhost:8700/status first, launches if needed).

title: Landing page hero - README buries the lede
description: Lead with one-liner setup: bunx haltija + one script tag. 30-second video showing AI controlling a real app. Clear 'Get Started in 2 Minutes' path.

title: Windows testing
description: Windows build scripts work but untested on real Windows. Test build script, fix platform-specific issues, add Windows to CI build matrix.

title: Desktop integration tests need running app
description: Integration tests in apps/desktop/integration.test.ts fail when desktop app isn't running. Tests should either skip gracefully or document the requirement clearly. Currently shows ConnectionRefused errors.

title: Phase 5: Cloud & CI Integration
description: The 10/10 unlock. Includes: CI/CD integration (GitHub Action), AI QA Agent, PR Integration with test results and screenshots.

title: GitHub Action for CI/CD
description: Running in CI requires manual setup. Create GitHub Action: uses: haltija/action@v1. Also GitLab CI template. Pre-configured for common setups (Next.js, Vite, CRA).

title: Graceful Port Handling
description: Server should try preferred port, auto-fallback to next available if busy. Support HALTIJA_PORT env var. Bookmarklet should scan port ranges to find running server. See TODO.md for full spec.

title: Pre-built binaries on GitHub Releases
description: Building locally requires dev environment. Add automated release workflow on git tag that publishes macOS (arm64, x64), Linux, Windows builds to GitHub Releases.

title: Multi-match reporting: show 'N others matched' for selector queries
description: When a selector matches multiple elements, act on the first but report how many others matched. Enables --nth N and --all flags for explicit multi-element targeting. jQuery-like: whether it's one or many, do the right thing.

title: Phase 4: Enterprise Readiness
description: What's needed for production deployment at scale. Dogfood in real CI environment first - these are hypotheses. Includes: API auth, audit logging, rate limiting, automated test reports.

title: API Authentication
description: No auth on REST API currently. Add optional API key authentication, token-based auth for multi-user scenarios, configurable via env var or config file.

title: Audit Logging
description: No record of what commands were executed. Add logging with timestamps, optional persistence to file, queryable history.

title: Phase 1: Documentation & Discovery
description: The product is better than people can tell. Fix that first. Includes: Landing page hero, consolidate docs, use case galleries, API reference polish.

title: Consolidate documentation
description: Docs scattered across CLAUDE.md, /docs, /api, embedded markdown, README. Create single well-organized docs/ folder with clear hierarchy: Quick Start → Guides → API Reference → Architecture.

title: Use case galleries / recipes page
description: Users don't know what's possible. Create recipes page with common workflows: testing login flow, exploring a codebase, recording/replaying bug reports, generating tests from manual exploration.
